company.name: Aamcha Auto
company.tagline: Book an Auto - Easy, Fast, and Reliable
company.description: Aamcha Auto offers reliable, affordable, and eco-friendly auto-rickshaw rides. Book an auto anytime, anywhere within minutes!

services.description: Book a ride instantly from your location. No waiting, no hassle.
Schedule a ride in advance for future trips. Perfect for airport pickups and office commutes.
Tailored transportation services for businesses. Easy monthly billing and tracking.
Choose our electric and hybrid auto-rickshaws to reduce your carbon footprint.

vision: We aim to become the leading provider of eco-friendly and affordable transportation solutions across India. Our vision is to create a seamless transportation network that connects people and places while promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact.
